value:
The land and its people...all come to
ruin. Nothing remains but...a
wasteland of despair...

The Fire Emblem...is nothing before
the despair that approaches, but...

If your future is one of loss...is set in
stone...it is best not to dally with
hope to begin with...

Robin... I shall never again...feel the
joy of hearing of your voice...

Those who were once my friends...
are no more. Only the Risen remain...

You shall count yourself...among
the dead...
If this power were mine...back then...

Who calls me? My name is...Chrom...
I am the king of corpses. Where I go...
despair follows...

All with physical form...shall fall to
ruin. The country and people...the
history and traditions... will crumble.$k$pDestruction cares not of mercy. It
consumes the people...their bonds...
their love...their very hearts...$k$pNone...can escape...this fate...
do not believe Askr to be the
exception, $Nu...
I am Chrom... Exalt over these fell forces...
Fate is inevitable... There is no changing it.
All corpses now—everyone... Ylisse is gone...
